title: New research reveals shocking racist attacks and public ... (Birmingham City University)
text: ( Source : Birmingham City University ) Last Updated: Friday, 09 October 2015 Muslims targeted by Islamophobic hate attacks are reluctant to report incidents of abuse and often receive little support from onlookers, a study commissioned by
